identity.name: E1: Nocturnal Nature
identity.description: A high-performance, dark-mode-first design language for trail runners. It blends the raw grit of mountain endurance with the precision of technical equipment. Think 'Salomon S/Lab meets Apple Watch Ultra'.
principles: Contrast: Deepest Blacks vs. Bio-luminescent Accents
Depth: Layered maps and elevation profiles as visual anchors

usage.data_labels: font-family: 'Inter', sans-serif; font-weight: 600; letter-spacing: 0.05em; text-transform: uppercase; font-size: 0.75rem;

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. SETUP: Install 'lucide-react' for icons. Use 'Barlow Condensed' for all headers (h1-h6) and 'Inter' for body text.
2. THEME: Force dark mode. Do not implement a light mode toggle. The brand is strictly nocturnal/outdoor.
3. MAPS: Use 'react-leaflet'. Style the map tiles using a dark provider (e.g., CartoDB Dark Matter) to match the UI. CSS: '.leaflet-container { background: #09090b; }'.
4. COMPONENTS: Customize Shadcn components. Remove default rounded-md and use rounded-xl or rounded-2xl for a more modern feel. Increase padding inside cards (p-6 or p-8).
5. LAYOUT: For the Race List, use a Masonry or Grid layout. Do not use a simple table. Each race card should show the elevation profile (simulated with a small sparkline chart if needed).
6. FORMS: In the 'Add Race' form, use multi-step wizards if possible, or clearly sectioned long forms with sticky headers.
7. IMAGES: Use the provided Unsplash URLs. Do not use placeholders like 'via.placeholder.com'.
8. ANIMATION: Add 'hover:scale-[1.02]' to race cards. Use 'framer-motion' for page transitions if possible.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: 'transition: all'. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add '.App { text-align: center; }' in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
